dn27:8.3: kosalassa anuyuttā → anantarā anuyuttā (bj, mr) | anantarā anuyantā (s1-3)
dn27:11.7: khuddamadhuṃ → khuddamadhu (bj, pts1) | khuddaṃ madhuṃ (mr), aneḷakaṃ → anelakaṃ (pts1)
dn27:12.2: Yato kho te → yato kho (si, s1-3, pts1)
dn27:16.12: asuci → vasalī (bj, mr) | vasali (s1-3), asucī → vasalī (bj, mr) | vasali (s1-3)
dn27:18.7: candimasūriyā → … suriyā (bj, s1-3, pts1), Sayaṃpabhāya → tāya (bj)
dn27:22.1: sattānaṃyeva → te sattānaṃyeva (s1, s2) | tesaṃ sattānaṃyeva (s3) | tesaṃ yeva kho vāseṭṭha sattānaṃ (pts1)
dn27:22.10: paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantī’ti, jhāyantīti kho → paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti jhāyantīti kho pana (bj, pts1) | paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti te kho (s1-3) | paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantīti kho (mr)
dn27:23.4: Na dānime → na dānime jhāyanti na dānime (bj, pts1, mr)
dn27:24.1: visukammante → vissutaṃ kammante (bj, pts1) | vissukammante (si) | visuṃ kammante (s1-3, mr)
